title: Hogwarts House Match
description: Discover the house traits you naturally lean toward in study, friendship, and challenge.

questions.prompt: A difficult exam is coming. What is your first move?

options.label: Challenge myself with the hardest material first.
Create a strict revision plan and follow it carefully.
Find a study group and support everyone.
Research beyond the syllabus to master the topic.

questions.prompt: A friend is being treated unfairly. You...

options.label: Step in immediately, even if it causes friction.
Gather facts first and then act with precision.
Talk privately and protect their emotional safety.
Use influence and strategy to shift the outcome.

questions.prompt: Which magical class sounds most exciting?
Pick a trait you want people to remember about you.
A hidden corridor opens. What do you do?

options.label: Explore it now before anyone else.
Document clues and decode its purpose.
Invite trusted friends to investigate safely.
Consider how it could give an advantage later.

questions.prompt: When leading a team, your style is...

options.label: Lead from the front and inspire action.
Build systems and smart decision paths.
Set goals, delegate hard, and push outcomes.

questions.prompt: Pick the magical creature you connect with most.

gryffindor.title: Gryffindor
gryffindor.summary: Bold, action-oriented, and willing to take risks for what matters.
gryffindor.details: You move toward challenge and often become the spark that gets others moving.

copyBlocks.text: Your profile shows courageous instincts with room to flex other house traits.
A strong Gryffindor signal: you consistently prioritize bravery and direct action.

hufflepuff.title: Hufflepuff
hufflepuff.summary: Grounded, loyal, and committed to fairness and steady effort.
hufflepuff.details: You build trust over time and focus on people as much as outcomes.

copyBlocks.text: Your answers suggest collaborative values and dependable follow-through.
A clear Hufflepuff signal: you consistently center loyalty, patience, and care.

ravenclaw.title: Ravenclaw
ravenclaw.summary: Curious, analytical, and energized by learning and ideas.
ravenclaw.details: You tend to solve problems through insight, patterns, and thoughtful strategy.

copyBlocks.text: Your profile leans intellectual with balanced strengths in other areas.
A strong Ravenclaw signal: you repeatedly choose depth, reflection, and discovery.

slytherin.title: Slytherin
slytherin.summary: Strategic, ambitious, and focused on influence and results.
slytherin.details: You think in terms of leverage, outcomes, and long-game positioning.

copyBlocks.text: Your profile shows practical ambition and tactical awareness.
A clear Slytherin signal: you consistently optimize for impact and advancement.

fallback.title: Balanced House Mix
fallback.summary: Your answers are spread across multiple house strengths.
fallback.details: Retake later to see how context shifts your profile.
